issue.title: [CF 759] Subterfuge prevents TMW from tracking stealth CD
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Pick Subterfuge as your teir 1 rogue talent
2. Stealth
3. Break Stealth

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
It's should operate just like it does without subterfuge but instead the cooldown isn't tracked at all as far as I can tell. No cooldown information is shown even when the icon is always visible.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors were produced as far as I know

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

``` ^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^S1784 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N1 ^SEnabled^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N61225^S~`~| ^Sicon^^ ```



> Posted by CurseForge user Ocyris_ | Imported from CurseForge issue #759 | Raw

comments.body:
1784 is the spellID of normal stealth. The spellID of stealth when you have Subterfuge learned is 115191.

There is, as far as I'm aware, no reason to be tracking this by spellID, so you would be best served by changing the icon from tracking by spellID to tracking the ability by name.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Could have sworn I checked it by spell name at one point. But you're correct it does work properly when done by name. I'm sure I had a reason for using spell ID at one point but that was a long time ago.

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Ocyris_
